summary: Fashion store application requiring customer data management and export functionality

existing_features.title: Create an admin page with a button to export all customer order data as a CSV file download
Add navigation link to the new customer data export page in the admin section of the header

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a backend query method to retrieve all customer order data including customer name, email, phone, address, order date, products purchased, quantities, prices, payment method, and order totals
